title: Timeline.fragment
content:
# Timeline.fragment.xml

```xml
<core:FragmentDefinition controllerName="sap.suite.ui.commons.sample.TimelineNoBinding.Timeline"
                         xmlns="sap.suite.ui.commons"
                         xmlns:core="sap.ui.core" xmlns:m="sap.m" width="100%" height="100%">
    <Timeline alignment="Right" axisOrientation="Vertical" showHeaderBar="false" sortOldestFirst="true">
        <content>
            <TimelineItem userName="Jesse Fisher" title="Update today" userPicture="/ext/timeline/person.png"
                          icon="sap-icon://activity-individual" text="Alexis is sick, Laura will help out"
                          dateTime="Today"></TimelineItem>
            <TimelineItem userName="Jesse Fisher" title="Tomorrow" userPicture="/ext/timeline/person.png"
                          icon="sap-icon://activity-individual" text="Clerks: Alexis and Robin"
                          dateTime="Yesterday"></TimelineItem>

        </content>
    </Timeline>
</core:FragmentDefinition>
```
